m_szDocTitle: Yingli Solar Confirms "Positive Momentum" In Solid Second Quarter | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- August 24th, 2016 by Joshua S Hill   The once troubled China-based solar manufacturer Yingli Solar has confirmed its predicted “positive momentum” in its second solid series of quarterly financials in a row. Yingli Solar, also known as Yingli Green, announced earlier this year that its Q1’16 financial results were its first profitable quarter in nearly five years. The company backed that up earlier this month by predicting that it would continue its “positive momentum” by posting another successful quarter when it announced its second quarter financial results
